blurb: Are you tired of overhyped, underdelivering crypto projects? Sick of scams pretending to be revolutionary? Meet Total Piece of Shit Coin (TPSC)— a coin that’s upfront about being absolutely worthless… and that’s exactly why it’s worth something!
shortBlurb: a coin that’s upfront about being absolutely worthless… and that’s exactly why it’s worth something!

reasons.title: Honesty First
reasons.blurb: Unlike other projects promising the moon, we promise you nothing—except entertainment and potential gains fueled by sheer meme power.

reasons.blurb: No roadmaps, no VC backing—just degens like you pushing TPSC to the moon (or straight into the sewer).
